name: friday_takeover_reflection
description: Your weekly ritual with LoopGPT. Every Friday, reflect on your week, celebrate wins, acknowledge challenges, and plan for next week. Get a shareable 'Week in Review' card to show off your progress. This is the engagement driver that keeps you coming back and the viral mechanism that brings new users.

chatgpt_user_id.description: Unique identifier for the ChatGPT user

week_number.description: Week number to review (optional - defaults to current week)

trigger_phrases: what did I accomplish this week
how did I do this week

lessons_learned: Consistency with tracking leads to results

suggested_adjustments: Keep doing what you're doing - it's working!
next_week_plan.motivation: Amazing progress! Keep up the great work - you're crushing it! ðŸ”¥

response_format.formatted_response: Markdown-formatted weekly reflection with next week plan

integration_notes.journey_flow: Journey 7 creates a weekly ritual that drives engagement and retention. Users look forward to Friday Takeover as a moment to reflect, celebrate, and recommit. This is the 'sticky' feature that keeps users coming back.
integration_notes.reflection_generation: Analyzes the entire week's data (weight, meals, adherence) to generate personalized reflections. Celebrates wins, acknowledges challenges with empathy, and extracts lessons learned.
integration_notes.next_week_planning: Provides actionable focus areas and suggested adjustments based on the week's performance. Conservative recommendations avoid overwhelming users.
integration_notes.viral_mechanics: Week in Review cards are the most shareable content. Users are proud to show their weekly wins, and the cards include impressive stats that attract new users.
integration_notes.friday_timing: Designed for Friday engagement, but users can trigger it any day. The Friday framing creates anticipation and ritual.
integration_notes.analytics_tracking: Tracks Friday Takeover engagement, card sharing, and week-over-week retention to measure the ritual's effectiveness.
